lines: 1. Ari'as'obweri borere mbwareo,Omwan'oyo Yeso nao araire,Ching'enang'eni chikamomoreka,Ase Yes'arareret' obonyansi.
2. Chiombe chikwana chiatura Omwana,Ko Omwana Yeso tari korera;Nche ningwanchete Yeso ndigererie,Mbesie Yeso goika mambia bokie.
3. Mbere ang'Omonene nasabire,Ombwate, Onyanche nagosabire;Osesenie abana orendete,Nario toragwener' agwo igoro.
